name: GoodTalk
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This is the platform you audio lovers have been waiting for. Here you can send in your talks to goodtalk369@gmail.com (mp3 only) to be one of the few featured to talk on the flyer, for everyone to hear. Now you can engage with people like never before by passively listening to whats on their minds. Talk about whatever you want, just make sure the quality is good. Giving the most value to people will guarantee you a good following. Try now and become a talker. Good talk
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
